name: BBQ Shawarma
description: Tasty, but quite expensive shawarma. Various types of meat and lavash colors.

name: Real Shawarma
description: One of the best shawarma in the city. Big and juicy.

name: Pitas
description: Interesting variations. They also have falafels and burritos.

name: Master Kebab
description: Fresh and you can always ask for a double sauce portion.

name: Shawarma "Krasnaya Shapochka"
description: Historical place. Unique recipe, can add adjika.
